content: Abdul Serwadda, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University Texas Tech Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Abdul Serwadda, Ph.D. Associate Professor CS Email: abdul.serwadda@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.6145 Office: EC 306D Mailing Address: Texas Tech UniversityDepartment of Computer ScienceBox 43104Lubbock, TX 79409−3104 Research Interests Cyber Security and Privacy Machine Learning and Data Mining Human-Computer Interaction Mobile Computing Personal Information Curriculum Vitae Education Ph.D., Louisiana Tech University M.S.(CS), Louisiana Tech University M.S.(Math), Louisiana Tech University Department of Computer Science Like Department of Computer Science on FacebookLike Department of Computer Science on Facebook Follow Department of Computer Science on InstagramFollow Department of Computer Science on Instagram Connect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedInConnect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedIn Address Texas Tech University, Box 43104 | Lubbock, TX 79409-3104 Phone 806.742.3527 Email cs@ttu.edu © 2025 Texas Tech University May 14, 2025 4:34 PM
